description: Doug Acre"The Destroyer"Ht: 5'6" WT: 150lbs Season W/L record ( 3-0)Marcus Ruhl"Titan"Ht: 5'11" WT: 210lbsSeason W/L record (2-1) The last quarter final match of Naked Kombat's Summer Smackdown Tournament is just heating up and this bout is the pure definition of "David and Goliath". In the red corner we have Doug "The Destroyer" Acre taking on the mountain of muscle, Marcus "Titan" Ruhl. With over a fifty pound weight difference The Destroyer really has his work cut out for him. As the match begins these two all stars charge at one another, The Destroyer using his leverage wisely to flip The Titan over his shoulders and lock him in a deep cradle. The Titan slams his body weight onto his smaller opponent and stretches him out in a full nelson while yanking on The Destroyer's giant cock. After three scorching hot rounds the winner is revealed while the loser is reduced to pony rides and relentless fucking before tasting what a winner's load of cum tastes like.
title: Summer Smackdown's Last Quarter Final Match! - David and Goliath Bout
